alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 5:46AM EST until December 25 at 4:28AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. For the Kennebec River...including Skowhegan, North Sidney, Augusta, Hallowell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at North Sidney. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 18.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
